book.title: The Music Player Daemon - User's Manual

chapter.title: Installation
chapter.para: We recommend that you use the software installation routines of your distribution to install MPD. Most operating systems have a MPD package, which is very easy to install.

section.title: Compiling from source
section.para: Download the source tarball from the MPD home page and unpack it:
Make sure that all the required libraries and build tools are installed. The INSTALL file has a list.
